fields.summary: CF: Simple 'positive' update case with a few 'no interruption' fields in resources

fields.description: Take the information gathered from EUCA-11605, EUCA-11606, EUCA-11607 and formulate a general "update stack" algorithm, and be able to call "update-stack" from a client (AWS SDK), and have the stack successfully update for at least one resource of a type that that fields of the "no interruption" update type (such as AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm).  Rollback is not part of this story.
fields.summary: CF: Simple 'positive' update case with a few 'no interruption' fields in resources
Determine if any updates need to occur

comments.body: Not all sub-tasks are complete and I can't close the sprint with this issue in the Done state. I am moving back to, to-do

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25026.354.20160712git783d0ca.el7}}

*Steps*

# Create stack using linked {{cfn-iam-resources-test-min.json}} template:
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-create-stack IAMTest --template-file cfn-iam-resources-test-min.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000341583960:stack/IAMTest/d643957e-fa90-4d1e-b35e-738618664399
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks IAMTest --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	IAMTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		IAM Resources - MVP for supported IAM resources	2016-07-19T04:05:33.382Z
OUTPUT	UserId	arn:aws:iam::000341583960:user/IAMTest-User-BJW0JU0MHDRR9
OUTPUT	AccessKeyId	AKIAA6ZP75HZ65VD4QI6
OUTPUT	AccessKeySecretKeyId	7LcHbnu3XS4bD4kWAgmMpgWEgq8Jrw0OUiXKLKT8
OUTPUT	GroupId	arn:aws:iam::000341583960:group/IAMTest-Group-0VMO3LFZRWSKT
OUTPUT	UserToGroupAdditionId	IAMTest-UserToGroupAddition-UWQVOICIC7CH7
OUTPUT	PolicyId	IAMTest-Policy-Y8OLWC3TFPYBB
OUTPUT	RoleId	arn:aws:iam::000341583960:role/IAMTest-Role-WFTUWRMZBIWHU
OUTPUT	InstanceProfileId	arn:aws:iam::000341583960:instance-profile/IAMTest-InstanceProfile-RR8ASHHH342HQ
{code}
# After stack completes, run {{UpdateStack}} with linked {{cfn-iam-resources-update-stack-nointerruption.json}} template:
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-update-stack IAMTest --template-file cfn-iam-resources-update-stack-nointerruption.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000341583960:stack/IAMTest/d643957e-fa90-4d1e-b35e-738618664399
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks IAMTest --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	IAMTest	UPDATE_COMPLETE		IAM Resources Update Stack Test - Updates to IAM resources that require no interruption	2016-07-19T04:05:33.382Z

{code}
